sentence.Network_en: A brown earthenware mug with a little green frog at the bottom.
sentence.Network_cn: 就是一种褐色的陶土杯,杯底内画有一只绿色的小青蛙.

sentence.Network_en: She made sure that the glassware and earthenware were always spotlessly clean.
sentence.Network_cn: 她总是把玻璃器皿和陶器洗刷得干干净净.

sentence.Network_en: They displayed some bowls of glazed earthenware.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们展出了一些上釉的陶碗.

entry.def: Earthenware bowls, pots, or other objects are made of clay that is baked so that it becomes hard.
Earthenware objects are referred to as earthenware .

example.tran: 五颜六色的意大利陶瓷器皿

means.word_mean: 1. ceramic ware made of porous clay fired at low heat
